snippet.title: Purrfectly Ever After [Otome Visual Novel] PV 2
snippet.description:
Kickstarter page: http://kck.st/1H5IYst 
Vote for us on Steam Greenlight: http://bit.ly/1fY3VK3

The heroine is a cat in a retro-futuristic setting who loves good food and would do anything for it. She wished to be a human, so that she could earn a living and not have to steal for food anymore. Her prayers were answered by an unseeming Fairy Godfather with one condition - that she would never steal again. And the next thing she thought of was to seek help from the person who saved her earlier!
